item.content:
Robo Soccer

Robo Soccer is a real time arcade game in which each bot is required to put a soccer ball in the desired area just like what happens in the game of football.

ROBOTS PER EVENT :One
LENGTH OF EVENT :Game Play
ROBOT WEIGHT RANGE :5 KG
ROBOT DIMENTIONS :30 cm BY 30 cm BY 30 cm
BATTERY POWER :40 V{230 V} Ac/Dc
ARENA SPECIFICATIONS :Actual
ENGINEERING PRINCIPLES :CoArt, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science,etc.
